item.title: Fantasy Voyager Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
While playing Fantasy Voyager , players need to use various units to fight off waves of enemies. Each character has unique abilities that can be combined to destroy even the strongest bosses. And to get many units from the beginning of the game, you should use Fantasy Voyager codes.

Each of these codes offers several rewards. Among them, players will find both Summoning Cards and Dream Gems. So, in just a couple of clicks, you can get new characters and resources to upgrade them.

All Fantasy Voyager Codes

Working Fantasy Voyager Codes

  • DC1010 - Redeem this code to get x2 A small pile of cat coins (1hr), x1 Hero Summoning Card, and x1 Fate Summon Card
  • FV666 - Redeem this code to get x40 Hero Summoning Card, x100 Dream Gem, and x50 Dream Steps
  • FV888 - Redeem this code to get x40 Hero Summoning Card, x100 Dream Gem, and x50 Dream Steps
  • FB123 - Redeem this code to get x2 Hero Summoning Card, x100 Dream Gem, and x2 A small pile of cat coins (1hr)
  • FB321 - Redeem this code to get x1 Fate Summon Card, x50 Dream Gem, and x2 A small pile of cat coins (1hr)

Expired Fantasy Voyager Codes

There are no expired codes in Fantasy Voyager . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

As befits the TD genre, Fantasy Voyage r offers players a huge pool of units. Some of them deal massive damage at close range, while others can attack enemies on the other side of the map. In addition, the unique abilities of the characters also impose different status effects, so to progress, you must use as many different units as possible. And Fantasy Voyager codes will help you with this.

Codes are a great source of free resources. It includes items such as Dream Steps and even Fate Summon Cards. But if you do not hurry, the codes will expire, and the rewards will become unavailable.

How to Redeem Fantasy Voyager Codes

Fortunately, using Fantasy Voyager codes is no more difficult than in other mobile games. You just need to follow these simple steps to get rewards:

  • Launch Fantasy Voyager . Then, click on the Adventure Journal on the right side of the screen.
  • Next, tap on the profile photo in the upper left corner of the screen and go to the Settings tab.
  • Finally, tap on the Code button, enter the code in the new window, and click Confirm to claim the goodies.

How to Get More Fantasy Voyager Codes

To stay up to date with the latest Fantasy Voyager codes, we recommend that you visit the official page of this free mobile game. There, you can easily find all the news about updates, events, and giveaways.

  • Fantasy Voyager Facebook page

Fantasy Voyager is available on mobile devices.

item.title: PS Plus Premium Adding 3 PS2 Classics in December 2024
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Classic PS2 games Sly 2, Sly 3, and Jak and Daxter are coming to PS Plus Premium on December 10.
  • Another batch of games are expected to arrive on December 17.
  • That same day, 16 titles are leaving PS Plus.

In a surprise announcement, Sony has confirmed three games that will be joining the Premium tier of its PlayStation Plus subscription service in December 2024. Most of the time, Sony announces the PlayStation Plus Premium games in the middle of the month. However, it decided to shake things up a bit with the December 2024 free games.

The last Wednesday of each month is typically when Sony announces the new PS Plus Essential games for the following month. That's exactly what happened with the free PS Plus games for December 2024, confirmed to be It Takes Two , Aliens: Dark Descent , and Temtem . But instead of just revealing the free PS Plus games for December 2024, Sony decided to give fans a sneak preview of what they can expect from the new PS Plus Premium games in December 2024 as well.

Sony has announced that Sly 2: Band of Thieves , Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves , and Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy are all joining the PS Plus Premium lineup on December 10. These classic PS2 games are coming to PS Plus Premium to help celebrate PlayStation's 30th anniversary, but they won't be coming alone. While Sony has yet to reveal what other games will be joining the Extra and Premium tiers in December 2024, it did confirm that more titles are on the way. Presumably, these titles will be added on Tuesday, December 17, which would be the typical day that new games are added to Extra and Premium, but there has yet to be any clarification on that front.

PS Plus Premium Games for December 2024

  • Sly 2: Band of Thieves
  • Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
  • Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy

December 17 will be a busy day for PlayStation Plus subscribers regardless. On that same day, at least 16 games are leaving PS Plus Extra, including games like Dead Island: Definitive Edition , Judgment , Mega Man 11 , Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin , and Tinykin . Games leave PS Plus Extra every month, but hopefully the new additions are enough to make up for the departures.

Even with a big batch of games leaving PS Plus in December 2024, subscribers should still be getting their money's worth and then some, especially if December 17 will see another set of PS Plus Extra and Premium games added that are independent of the special additions coming in December. Of course, one needs to be signed up for PS Plus Premium to enjoy absolutely every benefit that the service has to offer, and so fans should keep that in mind.

item.title: Call Of Duty Black Ops 6: Best Weapons For The Babylon Map
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Try the Grekhova pistol for faster, effective kills in Black Ops 6.
  • Stick with the XM4 for mid-range battles, a basic but solid weapon choice.
  • Use the HE-1 for explosive fun and easy kills, especially on the Babylon map.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 's multiplayer mode is a refreshing break from the feel of the prior two entries. The faster movement and smaller weapon count feel like a fresh start from the massive arsenal of the 2023 and 2022 entries.

This makes it a little easier to become familiar with all the guns and know what maps line up with which firearms. Babylon, with its square design and elevated platforms that act as vantage points, sees a mashup of different playstyles clashing together in intense firefights. A lot of different playstyles are valid here, so it is up to the player to decide what weapons below work best.

1 Grekhova

Finish Off Enemies With This Pistol

  • Unlocked at level 13

Pistols might not be the first weapons that come to mind in Call of Duty , but they have their importance. For one, a good pistol is an important backup in case one runs out of ammo or does not have time to reload in a firefight. Secondly, the right player can be just as effective in focusing on the smaller handguns instead of relying on an assault rifle.

The Grekhovka is a little weaker than the other pistols, but it offers a great rate of fire, making it perfect for switching to in the middle of a heated gunfight. Nothing feels cooler than finishing off enemies with the pistol and getting that Hot Swap medal.

2 XM4

Basic But Effective

  • Unlocked from level 1

With a game like Black Ops 6 , the developers want to make sure that everyone starts with a fighting chance. That is why there is nothing wrong with sticking by the XM4, the starting assault rifle. Being comfortable with it also ensures players do not feel lost when they prestige and lose all their weapons.

The XM4 is particularly great at mid-range battles, which are still vital in Babylon despite its compact design. It is not as great at close range as some of the SMGs or shotguns, but it still stands a fighting chance.

3 HE-1

For Some Explosive Fun

  • Unlocked at level 19

Call of Duty might be called a military shooter, but there is always room for absurd arcade fun. Anyone looking to complete challenges with the HE-1 will serve themselves well by using the rocket launcher on Babylon. Players will not be rocket jumping like it is Quake , but they can get some easy kills.

The small open areas on the outside of the map are easy to look out over from higher up, making anyone who runs across it a good target. Players do not need to directly hit their targets. Being close will work most of the time and the explosions will take care of the rest.

4 Jackal PDW

The Best The SMG Has To Offer

  • Unlocked at level 43

When it comes to SMGs, it is hard to find something better than the Jackal PDW. SMGs already offer nasty firepower for close-range encounters, which is a great advantage to have for Babylon. The Jackal PDW has a boost in range over its SMG brethren, however.

Players can exploit this advantage by using the proper attachments to further increase their accuracy and reduce recoil. With the right build, the Jack PDW is a great weapon for any map and not just Babylon.

5 AK-74

Better At Close Range Than The XM4

  • Unlocked at level 10

Do not confuse this weapon with the AK-47. It is an easy mistake to make, but at least the latter is not in this game so there is no worry about accidentally selecting the wrong weapon. Unlike the XM4, this assault rifle has a better chance at close-range encounters.

Those more accustomed to the feel of an Assault Rifle can still use this during the tighter corners offered in Babylon. When it comes to long-range firefights, players will want to reduce the recoil a bit by using the proper attachments, making the AK-74 a more well-rounded weapon.

6 XMG

Though It Is A Light Machine Gun, It Is Actually Quite Heavy

  • Unlocked at level 13

There is no getting around some of the drawbacks that come with an LMG. Reload times are going to be painfully long. Lasting long enough to use up the whole magazine is itself a good thing, though. For all the other drawbacks like accuracy and recoil, the XMG with the right attachments can minimize the negatives of the otherwise powerful weapon type.

It has a slower rate of fire than the other LMGs, but it is a worthy trade-off with its better damage range and accuracy, especially once recoil is less of a problem with the right build.

7 AEK-973

A Marksman Rifle With Good Close-Range Capabilities

  • Unlocked at level 34

Marksman Rifles require a special type of player in a game like Black Ops 6. Those who are not accurate might be frustrated at the semi-automatic rate of fire. This also makes the guns hard to use at close range. The AEK-973 shines in Babylon because of its burst-fire mode, making it more viable for mid-range and close-quarters firefights.

The natural long-range sensibilities of the Marksman Rifles also make it great for sniping from a vantage point. With the AEK-973, players can pick people off from across the map but also defend themselves when enemies come up close.

8 Stryder .22

  • Unlocked at level 40

The Stryder .22 is not one of the strongest handguns in the game, but it makes up for it in other areas. The superior handling and minimal recoil give it a special feel the other pistols lack. This makes it a great candidate for dual-wielding, or Akimbo, as it is known in Black Ops 6 .

With its small size, Babylon lends itself to a run-and-gun style. There is some risk in the open areas, but it is worth it for how quickly one can end enemy players with the dual pistols equipped.

item.title: League of Legends Capitalizing on Arcane For One Character Could Be a Blessing or a Curse
item.description:
League of Legends has long been one of the biggest games on the planet, so it's only fitting that its adaptation would eventually become lauded as one of the best ever made. Arcane has officially ended after two short seasons, with the finale providing a bittersweet conclusion for fans of the series. Arcane has even helped draw in new fans that may have never interacted with League of Legends otherwise, but this has come with some previously unintended consequences.

Despite the immense popularity of Arcane Season 1, Riot insisted that the show was not canon, and that it would not have any broader consequences for League of Legends . This has completely changed as of late, with Arcane now serving as the official backstory for League of Legends , and several corners of the game's lore being adjusted accordingly. This is great news for fans of Arcane and its original characters, but some League of Legends veterans are biting their nails over one classic character receiving a design overhaul.

Major League of Legends Updates Align with New Arcane Canon

Arcane is Slowly Replacing League of Legends Lore

Arcane 's first major impact on League of Legends was the simple addition of skins that referenced the show. This is about as inoffensive as it gets, as it allows fans of the game and the show to embrace whichever version they prefer. However, Arcane Season 2 brought with it a very different approach to adaptation, which has begun to sound alarm bells over the much-feared concept of brand synergy.

This was first felt when Ambessa joined League of Legends as a playable Champion. Ambessa was released as a powerhouse reflective of her reputation in Arcane , and she has already left a lasting impact on the game's meta. Ambessa's design was a solid dose of fan service for fans of Arcane , and showed that Riot was serious about making Arcane into the new canon for League of Legends . These efforts have only grown more prominent since, for better or for worse.

Just like her mother, Mel Medarda was first introduced in Season 1 of Arcane . Despite not showing much potential for a playable kit in Season 1, Mel's arc in Season 2 changed this drastically. By the end of Arcane , Mel has acquired a powerful set of abilities, and the end of the show coincided with an announcement that Mel will also be made playable in the near future. However, the most controversial decision doesn't come from new releases, but from the changes made to an existing character.

Viktor's League of Legends Rework Aligns with Arcane Design and Backstory

Viktor was released as a playable Champion in 2011, only two years after League of Legends first launched. Now, more than ten years since his release, Viktor is receiving a rework. Viktor's gameplay will be mostly untouched, save for a buff to his Ultimate, but his design and backstory are both being updated to reflect his appearance in Arcane .

It wasn't long after the announcement was made before this decision was met with the expected controversy. Some fans are livid at the loss of Viktor's classic design, others are celebrating the arrival of his new one, and plenty more are more lukewarm on the whole subject. With reasonable arguments rising from all sides, the pros of Viktor's redesign are just as readily apparent as the cons.

Viktor's Arcane Rework League of Legends Could Be a Double Edged-Sword

Comparing Viktor in Arcane vs. League of Legends

After all, Viktor is one of the most important characters in Arcane . Although the main plot undoubtedly centers around Vi, Jinx, and Caitlyn, the show's main subplot is guided by none other than Jayce and Viktor himself. Viktor's story is ultimately one of fighting against a perceived flaw, only to find acceptance with the people who have loved him not despite those flaws, but because of them.

Viktor's narrative in Arcane has touched many hearts, causing numerous viewers to fall deeply in love with this interpretation of the character. However, that doesn't change the fact that this depiction is rather different from League 's original version of Viktor. First and foremost, Viktor is much more mechanical in League of Legends , compared to the more organic Eldritch horror fans were introduced to in the final episodes of Arcane Season 2.

This simple design change does reveal a significant difference in each version's lore. In the original lore of League of Legends , Viktor believed entirely in the supremacy of machines, and would stop at nothing to prove that supremacy. Known as The Machine Herald, Viktor blamed most of history's tragedies on human error, and was determined to replace that error with a more perfect machine.

In Arcane , Viktor is much more similar to a cult leader. Viktor subjugates the wills of his followers, and claims that they all live in perfect harmony. While technology is still very much a part of his character, it is handled with an element of mysticism that is profoundly distinct from his origins as The Machine Herald. Despite this difference, the core of Viktor's character remains the same, as both versions ruthlessly pursue their ideal of Glorious Evolution at the expense of everything else.

League of Legends May Stake its Future on Viktor's Arcane Rework

Despite the heart of Viktor's character remaining intact, some fans remain angry at the major changes Arcane has made to League of Legends lore. This is an unfortunate consequence of many adaptations, in which the source material can be overwritten by the version that becomes more popular. This immediately calls into question why Riot would make such a divisive design change the new status quo, especially given its earlier remarks on the series' canon.

There is one simple hypothesis that appears to make this contradiction make sense, and is likely the motivation behind Riot's priorities here. There are very likely relatively few League of Legends players who have not seen Arcane , compared to the no doubt countless number of fans that have watched Arcane without ever logging onto League of Legends . Riot no doubt wants to close this gap as much as possible, and the first step in doing so is catering to fans of Arcane who have no other prior attachment to League lore.

This unfortunately means that years of precedent may be erased in the blink of an eye. On the other hand, the game may reach wider than ever before, with new fans being met by what made them fall in love with the series in the first place. Whatever the case, there's no denying that League of Legends lore wasn't exactly consistent to begin with. With the series now treating League of Legends shows like Arcane as the new canon, it may actually find a more consistent road map than ever before. Of course, the full implications of Viktor's impending rework are yet to be seen.

item.title: Roblox: Gym Race Simulator Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Gym Race Simulator is an action-packed time-killer with a bunch of features and mechanics that won't let you get bored even for a second. Here, you will need to work out in the gym and take part in races to get prizes and currency.

As in many other Roblox games, in Gym Race Simulator , you can greatly simplify the gameplay by redeeming codes. Codes will provide you with a bunch of freebies that will be very useful for developing your character and progressing in the game in general.

All Gym Race Simulator Codes

Working Gym Race Simulator Codes

  • WELCOME - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems, and Short Swords.

Expired Gym Race Simulator Codes

There are currently no expired Gym Race Simulator codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Gym Race Simulator codes will always be useful for your progress, no matter how advanced you are. So, if you are a beginner, or just have a lack of resources, rewards from codes are exactly what you need.

How to Redeem Codes for Gym Race Simulator

So, now that you have a list of codes that will bring you rewards, the only thing left to do is to find out how to get them. Fortunately, in Gym Race Simulator , as in most other Roblox games, redeeming codes is not difficult, especially if you have done it before, but if not, here is a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch the Gym Race Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the lower right corner of the screen. There will be a gear button. Click on it.
  • This will open the Settings menu. Here, click on the Codes button. It is located at the bottom of the menu.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Claim button below it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Finally, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a list of rewards received will appear below the input field.

How to Get More Gym Race Simulator Codes

To find more Gym Race Simulator codes, you'll need to spend some time monitoring the game's official social media. Here, you can find Roblox codes among other content, as well as news and announcements, so be careful not to miss anything.

  • Official Gym Race Simulator Roblox group.
  • Official Gym Race Simulator game page.
  • Official Gym Race Simulator Discord server.
  • Official Gym Race Simulator X account.
